This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Mark misspellings after typing. 
PASS Mark ungrammatical phrases after typing. 
PASS Mark overlapping grammer and spelling errors. 
PASS Mark misspellings in <textarea>. 
PASS Mark misspellings in <input>. 
PASS No marker on misspelled word when spellcheck=false. 
PASS Text without focus is checked by cold mode checker 
PASS Marker appears after setting spellcheck=true. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
